definition: Ninghua county in Sanming 三明[San1 ming2], Fujian
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Introduce the idea and project of CATV fibre-optical netting in urban and rural areas in Ninghua.
sentences.chinese: 介紹寧化縣城鄉有線電視光纖聯網設計思想和方案。
